title: Cavs Coach Takes Winding Road To NBA
teaser: Until this season, Cleveland Cavaliers coach David Blatt had never played and never coached in the NBA, even as an assistant.
contentencoded:
LeBron James and the Cleveland Cavaliers lead 3 games to 2 in their NBA playoff series against Chicago after beating the Bulls last night in Cleveland.

James is making his 10th straight postseason appearance, but his coach is new to the NBA playoffs. In fact, until this season, David Blatt had never played and never coached in the NBA, even as an assistant.

But the man whoâ€™s dodged flying objects while coaching in foreign leagues isn’t fazed by the bright lights. Doug Tribou of NPR and WBUR’s sports program Only A Game has our story.
